content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Additional burner inserter and chest at (5.5, 2.5) and (5.5, 3.5)

### Smelting Setup at (2, 7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5) and (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input/output chests at (21.5, 11.5) and (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (21.5, 13.5) and (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation Setup at (37.5, 19)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)

### Additional Water Pumps
- Two offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with entity placement overlapping water
- Check if the target location for placing entities like boilers is not overlapping with water tiles
- Use the map preview to identify suitable dry land locations for placement

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure you have the required pipe items in inventory before attempting to connect fluid entities
- When connecting entities with pipes, make sure the connection points are within valid range
- Verify that the connection path between entities is clear and doesn't intersect with other structures

### Power network issues
- Multiple entities are showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to form a complete electrical network
- Connect power generators (steam engines) to the electrical network using power poles
